title: The season ending

replies.body: We try and give as much heads up as we can, including a real time countdown timer on our [helpdesk ](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-support/W0aEONuP-2017-ranked-rewards-help-desk)thread.  The season ended on November 7th at 23:59 Pacific Time.  It sucks to hear you didn't have enough time, but the next season will be right around the corner.
